title: Interactive Exercise: Project File Organizer
description:
Create a file organizer that:
1. Creates a project directory structure
2. Finds all files of specific types
3. Organizes files into folders by type
4. Lists all files in the organized structure

**Project structure to create:**
```
project/
  ├── images/
  ├── documents/
  ├── code/
  └── data/
```

**Your task:**
Implement the functions below.
